name: Unity Dialogue Demo
description:
Thank you for checking out the Randomocity Gaming Unity Dialogue Demo! This project is a proof of concept aimed at recreating the text based dialogue system present in popular modern RPGs, particularly Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

Features:

- Typewriter style text printing

- 2D character expressions adjacent to the textbox

- Branching dialogue based on player choices

-Full voice acting support

Have fun poking around the demo!

Credits:

Voice Acting:

Mission Bold - Selwyn Drain

Baker Bold - Dylan Drain

Tendie Bold - Bill Johns

Skeptic Bold - Alexandra Bernard

Artwork:

Kobold 2D Artwork - Randomocity Gaming

Text Box Sprites - Randomocity Gaming
